content: There is a wise American saying: Never waste a crisis. And the current financial and economic crisis affords us a rare opportunity to pause and reflect on where we have been going and where it leads.
translations: ita:C'è un saggio detto americano che dice﹕ mai sprecare una crisi. L'attuale crisi finanziaria ed economica ci offre la rar
